title: Pixel Stands not charging Pixel 5's
content:
I have 3 Pixel Stands and 3 Pixel 5 handsets. The stands are not charging the handsets, no matter which 'pair' I use (they are all registered with each other). 

The stands use the adapter they came with, but even trying the 5 chargers doesn't fix it.

The devices have cases removed when put on the stands

Often the handsets actually completely discharge while on the stands


The only solution I have found so far, is to go into apps on each of the handsets, find Pixel Stand and uninstall updates. This gets the charging to work properly - so a faulty 'update'?

But of course the next time they update it all stops again.

This would seem to be a problem with the Pixel Stand update? Is it a known issue, is it being fixed, and if it can't be fixed, how do I stop the app updating until a fix has been found

Thanks in advance..
